content: कीर्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [कॄत्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Fame, renown, glory; इह कीर्तिमवाप्नेति <ls>Ms. 2. 9</ls>; वंशस्य कर्तारमनंतकीर्ति <ls>R. 2. 64</ls>; <ls>Me. 45.</ls> {@--2@} Favour, approbation. {@--3@} Dirt, mud. {@--4@} Extension, expansion. {@--5@} Light, lustre, splendour. {@--6@} Sound. {@--7@} Mention, speech, report.
